channel.title: CVE Feed for Page Builder Addons -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Page Builder Addons -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43960|2024-08-29T18:30:11.665Z -- page%20builder%20addons -- web%20and%20woocommerce%20addons%20for%20wpbakery%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Page Builder Addons Web and WooCommerce Addons for WPBakery Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Web and WooCommerce Addons for WPBakery Builder: from n/a through 1.4.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-43960|2024-08-29T17:47:33.954Z -- page%20builder%20addons -- web%20and%20woocommerce%20addons%20for%20wpbakery%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Page Builder Addons Web and WooCommerce Addons for WPBakery Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Web and WooCommerce Addons for WPBakery Builder: from n/a through 1.4.6.
